Reviews.Title: Great value in a first time DSLR kit
Reviews.Author: David A.
Reviews.Content: Had seen this same camera and lens kit at big box stores for the same price but without all of the extra accessories in this kit.  Fast shipping, easy registration with Nikon and I also got a Squaretrade warranty on the camera and lenses as I always do on more expensive electronics.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Transcend 16GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <5> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control +
<7> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-200mm VR Lens + 16GB Card + Case + Filters + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod + Remote + Accessory Kit
